mapper.select: SELECT ug.USER_GROUP_ID, ug.USER_ID, ug.GROUP_ID, ug.CREATED_AT, ug.CREATED_BY, u.NAME AS USER_NAME, u.USERNAME AS LOGIN_ID, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_CODE FROM TB_USER_GROUP ug INNER JOIN TB_USER u ON ug.USER_ID = u.USER_ID INNER JOIN TB_GROUP g ON ug.GROUP_ID = g.GROUP_ID WHERE ug.USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId}

SELECT ug.USER_GROUP_ID, ug.USER_ID, ug.GROUP_ID, ug.CREATED_AT, ug.CREATED_BY, u.NAME AS USER_NAME, u.USERNAME AS LOGIN_ID, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_CODE FROM TB_USER_GROUP ug INNER JOIN TB_USER u ON ug.USER_ID = u.USER_ID INNER JOIN TB_GROUP g ON ug.GROUP_ID = g.GROUP_ID WHERE ug.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} ORDER BY u.NAME

SELECT ug.USER_GROUP_ID, ug.USER_ID, ug.GROUP_ID, ug.CREATED_AT, ug.CREATED_BY, u.NAME AS USER_NAME, u.USERNAME AS LOGIN_ID, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_CODE FROM TB_USER_GROUP ug INNER JOIN TB_USER u ON ug.USER_ID = u.USER_ID INNER JOIN TB_GROUP g ON ug.GROUP_ID = g.GROUP_ID WHERE ug.USER_ID = #{userId} AND g.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY g.SORT_ORDER, g.GROUP_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER_GROUP WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
